### PR Checklist

<!-- Please check that your PR meets the following criteria. -->

* [ ] List items are about guidance in research, with likely long-term relevance.
* [ ] List items have a (hyperlinked) title and description, separated by a dash (`-`).
* [ ] Descriptions are concise, informative, start with an uppercase character, and end with a period.
* [ ] Sections (sub-lists) are sorted alphabetically, ascending by title.
